1593980.name: Cat Sports Online
1593980.description:
Become a champion in Cat Sports Online, a brand new online multiplayer game set on the tropical island resort of Catopia!
Play against other real players in a range of unique and addictive sports, starting with tennis and more to come!

In this version of tennis, you don't need to worry if the ball is out or if you have the confusing score system right, Cat Sports Tennis removes all confusion with
this new unique play style!
To keep the pace up and make the game challenging, there are no bounces allowed! You must volley the ball or else the opponent wins a point.
Wanna surprise your opponent? Add some spin to the ball to play a fast ball!

Tennis is the first gamemode in Cat Sports Online, Many more are to be added in future updates!
